description.en:
myDexChain has prepared an infrastructure that will allow you to shop quickly in the blockchain system with its fast infrastructure.
It is a technology that can make transfer transactions in a second and change all balances with its infrastructure compatible with commercial integration. DexChain offers the opportunity to make production by keeping the coin in your account with the dpos algorithm.
Daily DexRate gives crafting rewards based on difficulty level.
The DexChain coin produced is offered for sale on exchanges.
On the Mydexchain platform, companies and individual users can issue their own tokens and use them with the DexChain infrastructure
You can generate DexChain coins by keeping a Full Node from your computer or WPS servers.

You can win dexchain coin award by taking part in Transaction Verification process from Mobile App.
With DexLife's current passive income, you can earn daily staking rewards.

Digital Currency of the New World, DexChain.
